Vivi is supposedly a spitting image of her mother; so much so that when she was dressed up for her coming of age ceremony, Cobra almost mistook Vivi for her late mother.

character.name: Wiper
character.description: Wiper is the leader of the Shandian warriors fighting to take Upper Yard back from Enel. He is the direct descendant of Calgara.

character.name: Tonjit
character.description: Tonjit is one of the nomads that live on Long Ring Long Land.

character.name: Shelly
character.description: Shelly is Tonjit`s horse and an animal of Long Ring Long Land.

character.name: Porche
character.description: Porche is a member of the Foxy Pirates, she is considered an idol by the crew and is loved by all of the men.

character.name: Hamburg
character.description: Hamburg is a member of the Foxy Pirates and also the leader of the Groggy Monsters.

character.name: Itomimizu
character.description: Itomimizu is the announcer and commentator of the Davy Back Fight events. He is often seen riding a very large bird named Chuchun to get a better view of the action. His name means tubifex worm, leading to many fans referring to him as simply "Tubifex".

character.name: Chuchuun
character.description: Chuchuun is a Super Sparrow ridden by http://anidb.net/ch3158 [Itomimizu]. He and Itomimizu witnessed all the Davy Back Fight games between the http://anidb.net/ch3154 [Foxy Pirates] and the http://anidb.net/ch1954 [Straw Hat Pirates].

character.name: Kapoty
character.description: Capote is a billfish fishman who is also a member of the Foxy Pirates.

character.name: Monda
character.description: Monda is a Star Shark who is also one of the pet animals of the Foxy Pirates.

character.name: Pickles
character.description: Pickles, also known as the "Tackle Machine", is a member of the Groggy Monsters of the Foxy Pirates.

character.name: Big Pan
character.description: Big Pan is the largest member of the Foxy Pirates and a member of the Groggy Monsters. He is a wotan: a half fishman (Loach fishman) half giant breed.

character.name: Masshikaku
character.description: Mashikaku is a large rectangular man. He is an anime exclusive character that appeared in the Davy Back Fight arc fillers as a member of Foxy`s crew.

character.name: Chiqicheetah
character.description: Chiqicheetah is a character that appeared in the Davy Back Fight Arc fillers as a member of Foxy`s crew.

character.name: Juubei
character.description: Juubei is an anime-only member of the Foxy Pirates. He is a squid fishman.

character.name: Girarin
character.description: Girarin is an anime-only fishman pirate from the Foxy Pirates. He first appeared in the Round-around Roller Race of Davy Back Fight of the anime.

character.name: Aokiji
character.description: Kuzan, better known by his alias Admiral Aokiji, is one of the three Marine Admirals, and was once a Vice Admiral. He is a nominee from Sengoku for the position of Fleet Admiral.

character.name: Zambai
character.description: Zambai was a member of the Franky Family and was Franky`s right hand man. After the timeskip, he, Kiev, and Tamagon have joined the Galley-La Company as Zambai`s Company Union. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Kairiki Destroyers
character.description: The Kairiki Destroyers are three gigantic members of the Franky Family. They are the biggest in the Franky Family and are considered by the rest of the gang as some of the strongest members hence their name. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Sodom
character.description: Sodom and http://anidb.net/ch3258 [Gomorrah] are the two gigantic King Bull (sea horses in the most literal sense) owned by the http://anidb.net/ch3252 [Franky Family]. They are named after the Biblical cities, Sodom and Gomorrah. Gomorrah is yellow with a red mane.

character.name: Gomorrah
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch3257 [Sodom] and Gomorrah are the two gigantic King Bull (sea horses in the most literal sense) owned by the http://anidb.net/ch3252 [Franky Family]. They are named after the Biblical cities, Sodom and Gomorrah. Gomorrah is pink with red stripes and a green mane.

character.name: Tamagon
character.description: Tamagon is a member of the Franky Family. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Tom
character.description: Tom was a powerful long-horned cowfish fishman, known as the most skilled shipwright in the world. He was the head of his own company, Tom`s Workers. He was also Iceburg and Franky`s teacher and Den`s older brother. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Iceburg
character.description: Iceburg is the president of the Galley-La company and the mayor of Water 7. He is formerly one of Tom`s Workers.

character.name: Kalifa
character.description: Kalifa was http://anidb.net/ch3264 [Iceburg]`s secretary and is the only female member of http://anidb.net/ch3295 [CP9]. Kalifa is a slim woman with blue eyes and glasses that, like Kuro, she often pushes up. Her blonde hair was about shoulder length when she first infiltrated Water 7 and she grew it out over the years she spent undercover there. She kept it tied up in a bun as a secretary, but let it fall freely with a left sidelock when she was revealed to be an assassin. She has small studded earrings and usually wears outfits that reveal her legs, something http://anidb.net/ch3267 [Paulie] often chides her about while she was undercover. As an assassin, she wore a long-sleeved short black dress over a fishnet shirt and stockings along with black gloves and high-heels. In the Volume 44 SBS, it was revealed that Kalifa was very bookish as a child.

character.name: Paulie
character.description: Paulie is one of the three Dock One foremen of Water 7 specializing in rigging, knots, and masts, recently promoted to vice president of the Galley-La Company. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Kaku
character.description: Kaku is first seen as one of the five foremen of http://anidb.net/ch3262 [Galley-La Company]`s Dock One and specializes in mechanics diagnostics and housecalls. It was Kaku that inspected the http://anidb.net/ch2028 [Going Merry] and informed the http://anidb.net/ch1954 [Straw Hats] that it was irreparable. Later on it is revealed that Kaku is a member of http://anidb.net/ch3295 [CP9] operating undercover in order to obtain the Pluton blueprints from http://anidb.net/ch3264 [Iceburg]. Kaku has big black eyes and a long nose similar to http://anidb.net/ch478 [Usopp]`s only rectangular. He also has chatain hair. When he worked for the Galley-La Company, he wore a white cap, a high-collared orange shirt with blue sleeves, jeans and white sneakers. When he was revealed to be working for CP9, he wore a black cap, a black suit jacket with an orange handkerchief in the breast-pocket over a high-collared black shirt, pants and shoes. When invading Iceburg`s mansion he was wearing the skull mask. In SBS volume 44 he was depicted in an SBS as a child.

character.name: Rob Lucci
character.description: Rob Lucci is one of the main antagonists of the CP9 Saga, specifically the Water 7 and Enies Lobby Arcs. Introduced as one of the five foremen of Galley-La Company`s Dock One, he was a sawyer, treenail, and bolt specialist. He was later revealed to be the strongest member of the CP9 operating undercover to obtain the Pluton blueprint from Iceburg.

character.name: Hattori
character.description: Hattori is Rob Lucci`s pet pigeon. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Peeply Lulu
character.description: Peeply Lulu is one of the three foremen of Dock One of the Galley-La Company in Water 7. His specialties as shipwright are pitch, block and tackle, and blacksmithing. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Tilestone
character.description: Tilestone is one of the three foremen of Dock One of the Galley-La Company in Water 7. Tilestone is the last of the foremen to be formally introduced in the story, although he is present from the first scene Galley-La is shown in. His specialties are cabinetry, caulking, and flag making. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Spandam
character.description: Spandam is the chief of CP9 and the main antagonist of the Enies Lobby Arc. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Funk Freed
character.description: Funkfreed is the sword that Spandam uses. Funkfreed "ate" the Zo Zo no Mi and became an elephant-sword. He is charged with chief Spandam`s personal protection, to make up for Spandam`s physical weakness. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Fukurou
character.description: Fukuro is a former member of CP9 and one of the last to be introduced. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Kumadori
character.description: Kumadori is a former member of CP9 and one of the last agents to be introduced. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Jabura
character.description: Jabra was a member of CP9 and the supposed leader of his team. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Blueno
character.description: Blueno was the bartender of a bar before he was revealed to be an assassin of http://anidb.net/ch3295 [CP9]. He`s a tall man with big lips, a black beard and black hair in which his hairstyle resemble the horn of a bull. In the Volume 44 SBS, it was revealed that, when Blueno was younger, he loved baseball. When invading http://anidb.net/ch3264 [Iceburg]`s mansion he was wearing the bear mask.

character.name: Kokoro
character.description: Kokoro is the main conductor of the Sea Train, Puffing Tom, at the station just outside of Water 7 and an icefish mermaid. She has a granddaughter named Chimney, who accompanies her everywhere. She was the secretary of Tom, which is possibly why she is now the conductor. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Chimney
character.description: Chimney is the hyperactive granddaughter of Sea Train conductor Kokoro with an unknown father. She is the owner of a rabbit, Gonbe (who Chimney thinks is a cat). She appeared throughout the Water 7 Saga. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Yokozuna
character.description: Yokozuna is a giant sumo-wrestling frog, who was a friend (as well as pet) to the legendary shipwright Tom until Tom`s execution. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Banba-ji
character.description: Banba-ji is an old man from Water 7. He is the focus of filler episode involving http://anidb.net/ch479 [Sanji]. At first glance, Banba looks a drunken old man. However in reality, he is actually a excellent chef with superb skills.

character.name: Perona
character.description: Perona was the Zombie Animal and Zombie Ambush Commander of Thriller Bark before the collapse of Gekko Moriah`s zombie army. She is able to produce ghosts from her body through the powers of the Horo Horo no Mi. She was one of the major antagonists of the Thriller Bark arc, being one of the Mysterious Four, but has since become sort of an ally.

character.name: Dracule Mihawk
character.description: Dracule "Hawk-Eyes" Mihawk is a member of the Shichibukai and the current holder of the title, "Greatest Swordsman in the World". Mihawk served as Roronoa Zoro`s swordsmanship teacher during the two year time-skip.

character.name: Bartholomew Kuma
character.description: Bartholomew Kuma is a Shichibukai and former revolutionary with a bounty of Bsymbol. He was once feared as an extremely vicious pirate, earning himself the title "Tyrant". He is a type of cyborg called "Pacifista" developed by Dr. Vegapunk. Once Vegapunk finished his modifications on Kuma, the Shichibukai was converted into the first complete Pacifista cyborg with the serial PX-0, figuratively dying in the process. He was a very influential character during the Whitebeard War Saga, setting the stage for Luffy`s appearance in Amazon Lily, Impel Down, and Marineford. He has saved and defeated the Straw Hat Pirates on two occasions, and protected the Thousand Sunny during their two-year absence by making a deal with Vegapunk to have that mission programmed as his primary objective.

character.name: Marshall D. Teach
character.description: Marshall D. Teach, commonly referred to as Blackbeard is the captain of the Blackbeard Pirates. Blackbeard was formerly a member of the Whitebeard Pirates second division led by Portgas D. Ace until he killed fourth division commander Thatch for the Yami Yami no Mi. * Abilities: Blackbeard possesses incredible natural strength, evident of his massive build, he has eaten the Yami Yami no Mi, with it, he can manipulate gravity. Due to the Yami Yami no Mi`s gravitational ability, Blackbeard, unlike every other Logia user, cannot let attacks simply pass through him, meaning he takes damage like any human would but is also able to withstand more pain. He compensates for this one major flaw with his massive strength. The second, and most frightening power of the fruit is to nullify other Devil Fruit abilities through physical contact.

character.name: Kurohige Kaizoku-Dan
character.description: The Blackbeard pirates is a significantly powerful pirate crew, led by Marshall D. Teach, better known as "Blackbeard". Blackbeard`s flag is that of three skulls: one looking left, one looking forward, and one looking right.

character.name: Marco
character.description: Marco the Phoenix is the 1st division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates. He owes his nickname to his unique Mythical Zoan ability to transform into a phoenix at will.

character.name: Jozu
character.description: "Diamond" Jozu is the commander of the Whitebeard Pirates` 3rd division.

character.name: Edward Newgate
character.description: Edward Newgate, better known as Whitebeard, the captain of the Whitebeard Pirates, was known as the "Man closest to One Piece" or "The Strongest Man in the World" (世界最強の男 Sekai Saikyo no Otoko) and was one of the Yonkou that ruled over the New World. He was killed during the Battle of Marineford by his former subordinate Marshall D. Teach and his crew.

character.name: Tsuru
character.description: Vice-Admiral Tsuru the "Great Tactician" is one of Sengoku`s direct subordinates at the base in the Sanctuary of Mariejois. She is an elderly woman, similar in appearance to Dr. Kureha, but older-looking (and probably younger).

character.name: Strawberry
character.description: Vice Admiral Strawberry is a Marine officer, and one of the five vice admirals who led the Buster Call assault on Enies Lobby. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Momonga
character.description: Momonga is a Marine officer and one of the five vice admirals who had led the Buster Call on Enies Lobby. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Hina
character.description: Captain Hina is a Marine Captain, and a former classmate of notable Marine Commodore Smoker; she is also the object of both Jango and Fullbody`s affections.

character.name: Very Good
character.description: Very Good was one of the Marines who helped to attack the Straw Hats during the Buster Call at Enies Lobby. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Bogart
character.description: Bogart is a Marine Headquarters Marine and the right hand man of Vice Admiral Monkey D. Garp. His actual rank is unknown. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Masshikaku
character.description: Chief Petty Officer Masshikaku is a dull-looking subordinate to http://anidb.net/ch2060 [Smoker] and http://anidb.net/ch2061 [Tashigi]. He follows them around Loguetown for a while and was shown to be terrified of Luffy`s 30,000,000 beli bounty. His name means "Really Rectangular", which is an accurate description of his features. His name was first given in Grand Data File: Blue.

character.name: Jinsei Bara Shoku Riders
character.description: The Jinsei Bara Shoku Riders, formerly called the Tobiuo Riders were a kidnapping gang from around Sabaody Archipelago. They ride on flying fish, hence their gang`s name. Their leader is Duval. With the handles on their flying fish and the way they dress, they resemble a biker gang. Since Duval`s face alteration, however, the gang was reformed into the "Rosy Life Riders", and their purpose changed.

character.name: Yosaku
character.description: Yosaku along with Johnny are old friends and former bounty hunting partners of Roronoa Zoro.

character.name: Silvers Rayleigh
character.description: "Dark King" Silvers Rayleigh is the former first mate of the Roger Pirates, known to be the "Right Hand of the Pirate King". He became a coating mechanic in Sabaody Archipelago at some point after Gol D. Roger died and the crew was disbanded. He served as Luffy`s mentor in the use of Haki during the two year timeskip.

character.name: Heart Pirates
character.description: The Heart Pirates are an infamous and notable rookie pirate crew discovered on the Sabaody Archipelago around the time the Straw Hat Pirates arrived there. Their potential is further seen with the release of Haki by Silvers Rayleigh, upon which nearly every notable crewmate save one were not affected.

character.name: Trafalgar Law
character.description: Trafalgar Law is the captain and doctor of the Heart Pirates, a pirate crew from the North Blue. On top of being one of eleven pirates who have been referred to as "The Eleven Supernovas". He became one of the Shichibukai during the timeskip. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Bepo
character.description: Bepo is a bear who apparently knows how to talk from the Heart Pirates. He is fairly strong, being able to withstand a blast from Silvers Rayleigh`s Haki. He is also a martial artist with a fighting style similar in form of that of Sanji`s, but he uses his hands too.

character.name: Urouge
character.description: Urouge is a pirate who hails from a sky island. Judging by the style of the wings on his back, he is most likely of Bilkan origins. He is one of eleven pirates who have been referred to as "The Eleven Supernovas" on Sabaody Archipelago whose bounties are higher than when the Straw Hats arrive, and is the one with the lowest bounty of the said eleven.

character.name: Jinbe
character.description: Jinbe is a whale shark fishman and second captain of the Sun Pirates after Fisher Tiger, and who became a Shichibukai eleven years ago. He renounced his Shichibukai title at the Battle of Marineford, allying himself with the Whitebeard Pirates. After the timeskip he allies with the Straw Hat Pirates to prevent the New Fishman Pirates` coup d`état against the Neptune Royal Family and the Ryugu Kingdom.

character.name: Boa Hancock
character.description: Pirate Empress Boa Hancock is the only female member of the Shichibukai. She is the Snake Princess of Amazon Lily and rules over the Kuja tribe with her two younger Gorgon sisters, Boa Sandersonia and Boa Marigold. She was first mentioned by the Risky Brothers in the end of the Thriller Bark Arc when comparing her legendary beauty to the beauty of mermaids. She is considered by many to be the most beautiful woman in the world. While she currently remains employed within the Shichibukai, her love for Monkey D. Luffy has caused her to turn against the World Government on a number of occasions.

character.name: Pandaman
character.description: Pandaman is a joke character created by the author. He is so far, the most notable of Oda`s joke characters having appeared hidden in lots of One Piece episodes and movies.

character.name: Senchou
character.description: Captain of the ship which was attacked by the Alvida Pirates.

character.name: Super Saiyajin Gokuu
character.description: During the events of Dragon Ball Z, Gokuu becomes the first Super Saiyajin in a millennium after being overcome with rage by the murder of Krillin by the hand of Frieza.

character.name: Super Saiyajin 3 Gokuu
character.description: Gokuu first used this transformation in a brief battle against Majin Buu in order to stall him long enough for Trunks to find the Dragon Radar. He was able to overtake the monster, completely outmatching him blow for blow, though the obese version had yet to freely demonstrate his full power by getting angry at the time. He eventually retreated from the fight, as he wanted Goten and Trunks to defeat Buu with their fusion technique, as he "wouldn`t be around forever".

character.name: Son Gohan
character.description: Gohan is introduced as the first son of the primary protagonist, Son Goku, and his wife, Chi Chi, in volume #17 of the original manga, or the premiere episode of its animated adaptation, Dragon Ball Z. Gohan is the first Saiyan/Human hybrid in the series. As opposed to full-blooded Saiyans, whose hair stays the same from birth, Gohan`s is drawn at varying lengths, and changes markedly in style. Many of Yamcha`s hairstyles are used by Gohan at various points in his life. Initially, Gohan is illustrated garbed in a Hanfu-like surcoat with the Chinese character 孫, fixed on the front and the four-star Dragon Ball fitted on top of his hat. Piccolo later supplies him with a keikogi fashioned after Goku`s, but substitutes it with the demon character "魔" as a sign of his admission into the Demon Tribe. Normally thereafter, Gohan is drawn with a keikogi modeled after Piccolo`s own, with the anime recoloring his wristbands from blue to red and, during the Cell Games tournament, his obi from red to blue, despite reverting to the original colors for the former. On Namek, Gohan is portrayed in battle armor worn by Frieza`s henchmen, having been given it by Vegeta in preparation for their encounter with Frieza. Prior to his second fight with Majin Buu, Gohan asks Kibito for an outfit resembling his father`s, and is then drawn in a keikogi identical to Goku`s.

character.name: Gyuumaou
character.description: Despite his threatening sounding name, Ox-King is really quite harmless and fun loving. He was somewhat demonic when his castle became engulfed in flames on Fire Mountain during a picnic with his daughter, and wreaked havoc through the village at the foot of the mountain. He is Chichi`s biological father and thus, Gokuu`s father-in-law. He is very strong and trained alongside Grandpa Gohan under Kame Sennin`s tutelage.

character.name: Piccolo
character.description: Piccolo, whose full name is Piccolo Jr., was first introduced as the reincarnation of the evil http://anidb.net/ch22168 [Piccolo Daimaou] in http://anidb.net/a231 [Dragon Ball], making him a demon and arch-rival of the primary protagonist, http://anidb.net/ch2103 [Son Gokuu]. However, it is later revealed that he is from the race of alien beings called Namekians and he decides to team up with http://anidb.net/ch2103 [Gokuu] and his friends in order to beat newer, more dangerous threats.

character.name: Mr. Satan
character.description: Mr. Satan (known as Hercule in the English adaptations) is a flamboyant martial artist. After http://anidb.net/ch2103 [Gokuu] and his companions stop attending the Tenkaichi Budoukai, Mr. Satan starts winning them and becomes the reigning champion for many years. On a Q&A with mangaka http://anidb.net/cr1902 [Toriyama Akira] published in Super Exciting Guide - Character Volume on April 3, 2009, it is revealed that Mr. Satan is just a stage/ring name and that his actual first name is "Mark". While it seems like a common name, it is actually written out in katakana as マーク (maaku). If you rearrange the syllables, as you would with many names in the series to derive their puns, you end up with akuma (meaning "devil" or "demon"), which is in concordance with his daughter`s name being a pun on the English word "devil". During the Cell Games, he attempts to fight http://anidb.net/ch24822 [Cell], but even after being swatted away, he is given credit for Cell`s death by the media. He is soon called a world hero, gaining great wealth and a city named after him. Though Gokuu and his companions find his inflated ego and arrogance very annoying, he becomes close to them after befriending the good http://anidb.net/ch41758 [Majin Buu] and by helping defeat Kid Buu by using his appeal to the people of Earth to get energy for the Genki Dama. His daughter, http://anidb.net/ch12209 [Videl], marries http://anidb.net/ch9915 [Gohan].

character.name: Noko
character.description: In the anime, the character is called Dream, but credited as Noko (ノコ).

character.name: Mikazuki
character.description: Mikazuki was the pirate that http://anidb.net/ch3262 [Galley-La] beat after being threatened by him. He is the captain and only known member of the Big Helmet Pirates. He wears a large spherical helmet similar to http://anidb.net/ch3529 [Kokoro]`s with a crescent moon on it and has large canines resembling a demon. He has a bounty of 36,000,000 Beli. He is later seen in the fillers working for the debt collectors but he is easily defeated by http://anidb.net/ch475 [Zoro]. His name is Japanese for "crescent moon".

character.name: Sadi-chan
character.description: Sadi-chan is Impel Down`s sadomasochistic chief guard.

character.name: Little East Blue
character.description: Kansorn Island better known as Little East Blue, is an island inhabited by settlers from East Blue. Its name is similar to minor ethnic communities such as chinatowns. Its mayor is Fabre. Due to the inhabitants originating from East Blue, many of its buildings resemble structures found in East Blue such as a mini Baratie, a mansion resembling Kaya`s, the giant windmill resembling the one in Fuusha Village, a dojo resembling that of Zoro`s master`s dojo, and even a Orenami Fanclub dedicated to Nami. It also has a mikan plantation very similar to Bellemere`s. It is protected by a large hercules beetle named Boss.

character.name: Toriko
character.description: A Gourmet Hunter with an abnormally large appetite (A food serving for 500 people could only get him 1/10 full). He is known as one of the "Four Heavenly Kings", and his nickname is "The Glutton". Despite having a huge appetite and massive power, he doesn`t indiscriminately kill and eat any animal; he only kills those animals he decides to eat. He has immunity to seventy different poisons, created by injecting himself with a near fatal dose of each poison and causing his body to create antibodies. He also has an animal-like sense of smell. He has adopted the Battle Wolf`s new born pup and named it Terry Cloth. Like the other Kings, Toriko started of as a chain animal.

character.name: Komatsu
character.description: A six-star, (initially five), chef who works for Hotel Gourmet, part of the prestigious IGO (International Gourmet Organization). He is timid, but greatly interested by what he finds in his travels with Toriko. As a result, he tries to overcome his fear and does his best to help. He is a highly skilled and competent chief and has a large knowledge of foods that he knows which foods would work well together. Because he is otherwise normal, he`ll write a will whenever he come along on Toriko`s hunts. Currently, he is the only chef in the world who knows the complete recipe of the Century Soup. He keeps a Wall Penguin as a pet, which is also a key element of the soup.

character.name: Jinzouningen 18 Gou
character.description: Jinzouningen 18 Gou (Android #18 in the English adaptations) is a fictional character who first appears in the Dragon Ball manga created by http://anidb.net/cr1902 [Toriyama Akira], followed by the shows http://anidb.net/a1530 [Dragon Ball Z] and http://anidb.net/a233 [Dragon Ball GT]. She is a mass murderer in http://anidb.net/ch13302 [Future Trunks]` timeline. Originally a human, she and her brother were modified into cyborgs by http://anidb.net/ch18381 [Dr. Gero]. On a Q&A with mangaka http://anidb.net/cr1902 [Toriyama Akira] published May 2nd, 2014 it was revealed that her human name was Lazuli. After http://anidb.net/ch20915 [Cell] is defeated, http://anidb.net/ch11414 [Kuririn] uses the Dragon Balls to wish for her and her brother to be turned into humans; http://anidb.net/ch7015 [Shenron] is unable to perform this task because of the unfathomable differences in power between him and the duo, so he wishes instead for their self destruct devices to be removed. Kuririn pursues her and, at some point, they marry and have a daughter named http://anidb.net/ch30874 [Marron]. To clear up the heavily espoused misconception that she is a pure android and therefore could not have a child, Kuririn went on to explain to http://anidb.net/ch2103 [Son Gokuu] during the Tenkaichi Budoukai Saga that she was originally human but that Dr. Gero just "remodeled her a little bit."

character.name: Doma
character.description: Sometime in the past, Doma and his crew surrendered to Ace after he defeated them. Doma and his crew are first seen, along with a fleet of 42 other infamous pirate crews, allied with the Whitebeard Pirates, attacking Marineford to save Portgas D. Ace from his execution. When Whitebeard decided to attack personally, he is seen holding his sword, ready to fight alongside his "father". He has recently been shown in combat during the war against the marines. He wields two swords while his pet monkey that clings onto his neck wields a pistol, helping him in combat. He`s later seen among the group of New World captains who were backing up Luffy and Ivankov on Whitebeard`s orders. When the Blackbeard Pirates launched a barrage of bullets and blades at Whitebeard and killing him with it, Doma was seen crying. Later, when Shanks arrived, Doma was seen showing shock and unease.

character.name: McGuy
character.description: Makugai and his crew are first seen, along with a fleet of 42 other infamous pirate crews, allied with the Whitebeard Pirates, attacking Marineford to save Portgas D. Ace from his execution. When Squardo stabbed Whitebeard due to being deceived by Admiral Akainu, Makugai was seen as shocked as the other allies.

character.name: DeCalvan Brothers
character.description: The Decalvan Brothers and their crew are first seen, along with a fleet of 42 other infamous pirate crews, allied with the Whitebeard Pirates, attacking Marineford to save Portgas D. Ace from his execution.

character.name: Squard
character.description: While Gol D. Roger was still alive, he killed all the members of Squardo`s crew, which led Squardo to carry an intense hatred towards the Pirate King. Sometime later, he was taken in by Whitebeard, Roger`s enemy, at which time he was all alone. Squardo befriended Ace, without the knowledge of Ace being the son of his greatest enemy, and rebuilt his crew.

character.name: Portgas D. Rouge
character.description: She was living in Baterilla in South Blue when she was pregnant with Ace before Roger died. She held her pregnancy for 20 months through sheer willpower in order to deceive the world of Ace`s connection to the Pirate King. The result of holding Ace for so long however led to her death from exhaustion after giving birth.

character.name: Thatch
character.description: Thatch was the commander of the 4th division of the Whitebeard Pirates, until he was killed by Marshall D. Teach.

character.name: Vista
character.description: "Flower Sword" Vista is the 5th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.

character.name: Blamenco
character.description: Blamenco is the Commander of the 6th Division of the Whitebeard Pirates.

character.name: Rakuyou
character.description: Rakuyou is the commander of the 7th division of the Whitebeard Pirates.

character.name: Namur
character.description: Namur is the commander of the 8th division of the Whitebeard Pirates.

character.name: Kingdew
character.description: Kingdew is the commander of the 11th division of the Whitebeard Pirates.

character.name: Atmos
character.description: Atmos is the commander of the 13th division of the Whitebeard Pirates. He is known as the Water Buffalo.

character.name: Haruta
character.description: Haruta is the commander of the 12th division of the Whitebeard Pirates.

character.name: Fossa
character.description: Fossa is the commander of the 15th division of the Whitebeard Pirates.

character.name: Izou
character.description: Izou is the commander of the 16th division of the Whitebeard Pirates.

character.name: Speed Jiru
character.description: Speed Jiru is the commander of the 14th division of the Whitebeard Pirates.

character.name: Curiel
character.description: Curiel is the 10th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.

character.name: Blenheim
character.description: Blenheim is the large commander of the 9th division of the Whitebeard Pirates.

character.name: Kong
character.description: Kong is the World Government Commander-in-Chief. He was the former Fleet Admiral of the Marines 25 years ago, at the time of the battle of the Edd War, between Gol D. Roger and Shiki.

character.name: Curly Dadan
character.description: Curly Dadan is a friend of Monkey D. Garp`s and the foster mother of Portgas D. Ace and Luffy. Garp entrusted her to take care of Portgas D. Ace shortly after the boy`s birth. Later, Garp also left Luffy in Dadan`s care. Dadan lives on Mt. Corvo near the Windmill Village. She is the Mt. Corvo mountain bandit boss of the Dadan family and a wanted criminal. She was first mentioned after the Enies Lobby incident when Garp come to Water 7, which he claims that he left Luffy and Ace to train with a friend. Her name was first mentioned by mayor Woop Slap after he saw Luffy new bounty and questioned "Does Dadan know!?".

character.name: Whitey Bay
character.description: Whitey Bay is a New World pirate captain known as the "Ice Witch". She is one of the many pirates allied with Whitebeard who have journeyed to Marineford to rescue Portgas D. Ace.

character.name: Little Oars Jr.
character.description: "Little" Oars Jr. is a pirate captain who is the descendant of Oars and an ally of the Whitebeard Pirates. He is among the several New World pirates aiding the Whitebeard Pirates in saving Ace from execution by the World Government.

character.name: Ronse
character.description: Vice-Admiral Ronse is a Marine Vice Admiral who is also part of the Giant Squad.

character.name: Lacroix
character.description: Vice-Admiral Lacroix is a Marine Vice Admiral who is also part of the Giant Squad.

character.name: Ramba
character.description: Ramba is a very tall man, towering over most of his fellow allies, with a slim build. He wears a long, white robe reaching down to his feet, with loose, ruffled-edged sleeves under a dark blue vest and a blue cape with a high collar. He also sports some particular pieces of armor in his attire, these being a pair of golden shoulder pads and his signature crested helm, which has what looks like a Jolly Roger represented on the red part on the front of it and covers the upper part of Ramba`s head. He carries around a long sword, fitting his height.

character.name: A.O
character.description: A.O is a very tall man with a long square shaped face, hollow eyes under prominent eyebrows, dark sideburns that go all the way down to his chin, and greenish long wavy hair. On his head he wears a striped bandanna with a standard tricone captain`s hat with what appears to be his Jolly Roger on it, a skull wearing an animal-like hood. He also wears a dark blue, open shirt with the sleeves rolled up and a ruffled collar, and elaborate earrings made up by three little jewels each on both ears.

character.name: Delacuaji
character.description: Delacuaji is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

character.name: Bizarre
character.description: Bizarre is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

character.name: Isleone
character.description: Isle One is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

character.name: Epoida
character.description: Epoida is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

character.name: Blondie
character.description: Blondie is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

character.name: Karma
character.description: Karma is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

character.name: Amadov
character.description: Amadov is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

character.name: Yuda
character.description: Yuda are a ferocious and poisonous type of sea serpents. They live in the Calm Belt and are so dangerous that they are one of the few creatures, that Sea Kings won`t attack, but apparently the Kuja people were able to domesticate them. Boa Hancock and her two sisters own a ship which is drawn by these creatures, a newly added method of navigating through the Calm Belt.

character.name: Son Goten
character.description: Goten is first introduced at age 7, basically appearing out of nowhere. He is the second son of Goku and ChiChi, and it is said he was born shortly before Goku died. There is no explanation as to why he was never shown or mentioned earlier.

character.name: Elmy
character.description: Elmy is an infamous New World pirate who allied herself with Whitebeard.

character.name: Palms
character.description: Palms is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

character.name: Kibin
character.description: Commodore Kibin is an anime only Marine that debuted during Marineford arc. He held a jutte, and used several Rokushiki techniques in an attempt to stop Luffy, but was ultimately defeated.

character.name: Dalmatian
character.description: Vice-Admiral Dalmatian is one of the many Marine Vice Admirals to have participated in the Battle of Marineford.

character.name: Pavlik
character.description: Pavlik is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

character.name: Andre
character.description: Andre is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

character.name: Coco
character.description: The "Gentleman" of the "Four Heavenly Kings," he is good friends with Toriko. While Toriko mostly relies on his brute strength, Coco prefers using stealthy techniques and cunning strategy to subdue aggressors. He is also strong defensively. He is immune to five hundred different kinds of poison. He earns most of his living by working as a fortuneteller; his fortunes have a 97% accuracy rating, which also makes him extremely popular with women and as a result he is mobbed by costumers when he is in public. He also has the ability to see non-visible spectrums of light and can read electromagnetic auras in order to predict an animal`s next action. He and the other Four Heavenly Kings were trained by Ichiryuu, the president of the IGO.

character.name: Sunny
character.description: One of the "Four Heavenly Kings," he is first shown to have great strength, like Toriko, carrying a Regal Mammoth with one arm (although this was merely a clever trick from using his monstrously strong hair, each one of its strings being strong enough to lift nearly 500 pounds). He is Rin`s older brother. He is a calm and collected pretty boy who judges the beauty of people`s actions and speaks in an elegant, almost flirting manner. He has a way of knocking without touching the target, mostly related to his "sensor" talent which allows him to know the physical state of those around him. His sensor is actually thousand upon thousands of super thin hairs that can reach a maximum of 25 feet (7.6 m) in length. Sani`s body has a very high body temperature and powerful sense of touch, being touched by his hair or any part of his body can only be described as Sani tasting whatever he is touching. He seeks "harmony" in his dishes, defined as the perfect use of ingredients, perfect handling of the food, and most importantly producing the prefect taste. He seems to be slightly in love with Komatsu (or at least his skills since they seem to produce the "harmony" Sani looks for in meals). When he sees Rin his calm personality disappears and is replaced by that of an over-protective older brother, shocked by how much weight she gained from eating too many sweets, leading to a comical sibling spat between them. He also expresses a great sense of disgust towards the Bishoku-kai, displaying anger after seeing the slaughtered creatures with a bite taken out of them that followed a GT Robo`s path of destruction. He and the other Four Heavenly Kings were trained by Ichiryuu, the president of the IGO.

character.name: Rin
character.description: A tomboyish pheromone and other odor composition user who acts as a beast handler at the gourmet Coliseum, a fighting ring run by IGO that pits beast against each other to both validate the accuracy of CLVL rankings and as entertainment for world officials, her nickname is "the wild beast tamer." She has a crush on Toriko as shown when she heard he was at the Coliseum she busily began applying makeup. She is the younger sister of one of the Four Heavenly Kings, Sani. She blushes whenever Toriko talks to her (even if he just says her name) or does something kind. She seems to have a weakness for sweets. She is protective of Toriko, as shown when Sani touches his cheek and comments on his skin and Rin gets flustered and tells Sani not to touch Toriko. She also seems to have been implanted with Gourmet Cells.

character.name: Mansam
character.description: IGO`s Development Bureau Director and Gourmet Research Facility Chief, he holds IGO`s third position, with authority below the CEO and President. He is an old friend of Toriko`s and has the same body type. He runs IGO`s Garden One, a facility where 30% of the world`s gourmet foods are made. It also clones long extinct animals and performs selective breeding. He has an incredibly high pain tolerance, able to live through being stabbed in the gut and a hole blown through his throat, and he heals himself by drinking alcohol. He appears to be able to use the same muscle enhancing abilities that Jirou the Knocking master uses. When someone says his name he thinks they are calling him handsome; this is a pun as his name sounds similar to the English word "handsome." He seems to be always drunk or just in a really happy state most of the time, only when someone mentions a job that needs doing or when he is gets angry does he change to a more serious manner.

character.name: Terry Cloth
character.description: A newborn Battle Wolf pup that has been adopted by Toriko, it sees Toriko as a parental figure, a big surprise since Battle Wolves never become attached to humans. Terry got his name from how Toriko described his fur. Only few foods suit its taste, such as Gourmet World`s foods.

character.name: Avalo Pizarro
character.description: Avalo Pizarro, also known as "Corrupt King", was one of the criminals who was given a life sentence in Level 6 of Impel Down, as his crimes were so atrocious he had to effectively be erased from history. He has since been freed by Marshall D. Teach and since then has become a member of the Blackbeard Pirates.

character.name: Sanjuan Wolf
character.description: Sanjuan Wolf is a colossal giant, known as "Colossal Battleship" for his size, and was originally one of the legendary criminals who was given a life sentence in Level 6 of Impel Down, as his crimes were so atrocious they had to effectively be erased from history itself. He was initially mentioned briefly by Emporio Ivankov. He was eventually freed from prison by Marshall D. Teach, and since then became a member of the Blackbeard Pirates.

character.name: Kinga
character.description: Kinga is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

character.name: Catarina Devon
character.description: Catarina Devon known as the "Crescent Moon Hunter", was the most dangerous female pirate ever to be imprisoned in Impel Down within the entire age of pirates. She was originally imprisoned in Level 6 of Impel Down, along with other legendary criminals whose existences were erased from history. She was initially mentioned briefly by Emporio Ivankov. She has been freed by Marshall D. Teach and became the only female member of the Blackbeard Pirates.

character.name: Vasco Shot
character.description: "Heavy Drinker" Vasco Shot was one of the legendary criminals who was given a life sentence in Level 6 of Impel Down, the level for prisoners whose crimes were so atrocious that they had to effectively be erased from history. He was initially mentioned briefly by Emporio Ivankov. He has since been freed by Marshall D. Teach from prison, and since then has become a member of the Blackbeard Pirates.

character.name: Brew
character.description: Brew is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

character.name: Zebra
character.description: Described by Toriko as the most powerful of the "Four Heavenly Kings" for his pure destructive capabilities, Zebra is a very large and well-built man with scars that cover most of his body, one of the more striking ones being the half Glasgow smile on the left side of his face. His personality is very angry and small-tempered, he enjoys fighting the most out of all the Heavenly Kings and has a self-professed hatred for anyone or anything acting "cocky". He is incredibly strong, having single handily caused all the scars on Match`s body, killing dozens of prisoners in "Honey Prison" in the matter of minutes, and destroying many beasts with a capture level above 60, including the Magma Tortoise (CLV 70). He is held in "Honey Prison". He and the other Four Heavenly Kings were trained by Ichiryuu, the president of the IGO.

character.name: Tina
character.description: Tina is a television reporter who appears in the anime series. She is also the news anchor for Gourmet News.

character.name: Chahige
character.description: Brownbeard is a New World pirate. After Whitebeard`s death he went off and took control of Foodvalten, one of the New World islands formerly under his protection.

character.name: Tsunawatari Funan Bros
character.description: The Tsunawatari Funan Bros are a trio of minor pirates in the Buggy Pirates.

character.name: Kinkai no Nushi
character.description: Kinkai no Nushi is Fuusha Village`s local sea monster, a Sea King who inhabits the waters near Luffy`s home village.

character.name: Kairiki Domingos
character.description: The Kairiki Domingos are members of the Buggy Pirates under the command of their captain, Buggy. They were seen chasing Nami when she stole Buggy`s map of the Grand Line. However she escaped with help from Luffy.

character.name: Dogra
character.description: Dogra is a member of Dadan`s bandits that are active on Mt. Corvo on Dawn Island. He helped take care of Ace and Luffy for Garp.

character.name: Magra
character.description: Magra is a member of Dadan`s bandits that are active on Mt. Corvo on Dawn Island. He helped take care of Ace and Luffy for Garp.

character.name: Dadan Ikka
character.description: The Dadan Ikka is a gang of mountain bandits ran by Curly Dadan, and they inhabit the Mt. Corvo of Dawn Island in East Blue. The crimes they committed number higher than stars in the sky.

character.name: Sabo
character.description: Sabo was born into a noble family but decided to run away and live in the Gray Terminal. He was a friend of Portgas D. Ace, and eventually became a friend of Monkey D. Luffy, to the point where the three considered themselves to be "brothers".

character.name: Kruppou
character.description: Kruppou is Tina`s Carrier Balloon Pigeon and her constant companion when doing outdoor news.

character.name: Porchemy
character.description: Porchemy was a member of the Bluejam Pirates.

character.name: Bluejam
character.description: Bluejam is the captain of the Bluejam Pirates, and a famous pirate of East Blue.

character.name: Bluejam Pirates
character.description: Bluejam Pirates were a crew that Luffy, Ace and Sabo faced 10 years ago on Dawn Island. Ace and Sabo stole money from one of the crew members.

character.name: Naguri
character.description: Naguri is an anime-only character and former pirate captain that lived in the Gray Terminal twelve years before the current storyline. It is unknown where he is, or even whether he is still alive right now.

character.name: Stelly
character.description: Stelly is a Noble adopted by Sabo`s family. He was eight years old at the time of his introduction and comes from a noble family with a higher status than Sabo`s.

character.name: Kiss
character.description: Kiss is said to be the last remaining Emperor Crow and lives with Coco. He considers him family, having raised him from an egg. Though the species is classified as extinct, rumors still circulate that somewhere in this vast Gourmet World they live on.

character.name: Setsuno
character.description: A Gourmet Living National Treasure, Setsuno is Jirou`s long-time partner, and has the same Full-Course Meal as him. She has the skill and capability of easily doing the work of eight top-level chefs. Setsuno attempts to recreate the legendary Century Soup Jirou gave to her at some point; however, it is incomplete and she requests Toriko and Komatsu to find the missing ingredient after being impressed by their relationship and strong knowledge and respect of the gourmet ingredients. Although an old woman, she still has incredible power, breaking all of Alfaro`s Plate Shuriken from far away without seeming to move, and is one of the few people brave enough to call the Bishoku-kai boss an "idiot." However, she has still lost some of her power since her early days, losing some of her ability to let her Gourmet Cells "adapt." This is characterized by her having "White Breath" in Ice Hell, meaning her Cells did not adapt to the cold environment and warm her body accordingly. Melk the First said that the knife of Setsuno is one of the few knives he got a shock from after seeing.

character.name: Saint Jalmack
character.description: Saint Jalmack is a World Noble who was introduced ten years prior to the start of the series.

character.name: Pochi
character.description: Pochi is an anime only dog that lives with the Dadan Family.

character.name: Chiken
character.description: Chiken is the wife of Gyoru, the fishmonger. She lives in Foosha Village. She always takes care of the shop with a smile on her face.

character.name: Gyoru
character.description: Gyoru is a fishmonger in Foosha Village. Luffy used to go to his shop to buy his fish. He appears in Chapter 1 when he asks Luffy if he thinks he is cool being a freak. His wife is Chiken.

character.name: Pekkori
character.description: Pekkori is the leader of Harahettania, the Land of Poverty, situated on Namakura Island in the Grand Line. He directed the ritual in which he and his people "summoned" Brook, though they were trying to summon the devil.

character.name: Penguin
character.description: Penguin is one of the members of the Heart Pirates.

character.name: Shachi
character.description: Shachi is one of the members of the Heart Pirates.

character.name: Tenaga-zoku
character.description: Tenaga-zoku are a tribe in the series. Scratchmen Apoo, captain of the On Air Pirates and one of the Eleven Supernovas, is the only named member of this tribe.

character.name: Kop
character.description: Kop is a member of the Franky Family. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Coffee Monkeys
character.description: The Coffee Monkeys are a kidnapping group based on the Sabaody Archipelago. True to their group name, they have monkey tails and appearances, as well as act like the said animals. When the Straw Hat Pirates visit them they are drunk because their prize slave catch, a giant, was for nothing because Peterman took a mermaid to the Auction House after them. The only reason that they caught the giant was due to him being asleep at the time.

character.name: Gorilla
character.description: Captain Gorilla (Gorilla Taisa) is a Marine officer who was sent to investigate the Nightmare of Barujimoa accidentally caused by Franky.

character.name: Nise Mugiwara no Ichimi
character.description: The Nise Mugiwara no Ichimi are a group of pirates that attempted to impersonate the original Straw Hat Pirates in order to benefit from their reputation.

character.name: Nise Zoro
character.description: Nise Zoro is a member of the Impostor Straw Hat Pirates who was masquerading as the real Roronoa Zoro.

character.name: Drip
character.description: Drip is a member of the Nise Mugiwara no Ichimi who was masquerading as the real Sanji.

character.name: Kokoa
character.description: Kokoa is one of the Nise Mugiwara no Ichimi, she masqueraded as Robin.

character.name: Nise Chopper
character.description: Nise Chopper is a fox filling the role of the "pet" for the Nise Mugiwara no Ichimi, not knowing that the real Chopper is the crew`s doctor and is given human-traits from the Hito Hito no Mi.

character.name: Lily
character.description: Lily was first seen with Sarquiss on Jaya Island. She was the only member of the minor crew members in Bellamy`s crew that was openly named. Lily appeared in most of the events the crew were involved with during the Jaya Arc. She was last seen when Donquixote Doflamingo came to punish Bellamy.

character.name: Sexy Foxy
character.description: The Sexy Foxy is the ship used by Gin-gitsune no Foxy. It is an enormous ship with a giant fox head at the bow. The final event of the Davy Back Fight, Combat, took place here.

character.name: Karibuu Kaizoku-dan
character.description: The Karibuu Kaizoku-dan are a crew who arrived at Sabaody Archipelago around the same time as the Mugiwara no Ichimi were reuniting. Their captains are the brothers Karibuu and Koribuu, which temporarily changed to Demalo Black when they joined the Nise Mugiwara no Ichimi, under the belief they were real until the truth was disclosed.

character.name: Karibuu
character.description: Nuregami no Karibuu is an infamous rookie pirate who was at the Sabaody Archipelago around the time of the Mugiwara no Ichimi`s reunion. Deranged, sadistic and prone to acts of brutal violence, he has earned a bounty of 210,000,000, making him part of the new generation of rookie pirates with bounties over 100,000,000. He is the brother of Kaerichi no Koribuu, another infamous rookie. Both brothers gained their reputations for killing Marines. As both of them have bounties of over 70,000,000, they both fulfill the requirement of the Nise Mugiwara no Ichimi, but they eventually left upon discovering the crew`s fraudulence.

character.name: Koribuu
character.description: Kaerichi no Koribuu is a pirate captain famous for killing marines who was at the Sabaody Archipelago around the time of the Mugiwara no Ichimi` reunion. He, along with his brother Nuregami no Karibuu, another infamous rookie, joined the Nise Mugiwara no Ichimi temporarily. He has a bounty of 190,000,000, making him part of the new generation of rookies, following in the path of Luffy and the other Supernovas with bounties over 100,000,000.

character.name: Albion
character.description: Fukade no Albion is one of the rookie pirates joining the Nise Mugiwara no Ichimi. He has a bounty of 92,000,000.

character.name: Lip Doughty
character.description: Lip "Service" Doughty is one of the rookies who has joined the ranks of the Nise Mugiwara no Ichimi. He has a bounty of 88,000,000.

character.name: Sea Monkey
character.description: The Sea Monkey is a sea creatures that resembles a monkey. Found after returning from Skypiea and before arriving at Long Ring Long Land island, they have powerful flippers that can cause tidal waves. The Fanged Toad Pirates`s ship sank due to the waves they created.

character.name: Kiba
character.description: Kiba was the former captain of the Fanged Toad Pirates until he lost to Foxy at the Davy Back Fight and joined his crew.

character.name: Kiba Gaeru Kaizoku-dan
character.description: The Kiba Gaeru Kaizoku-dan were a crew of pirates that the Mugiwara no Ichimi met when they touched down on the blue seas again after leaving Skypiea. Their ship had no flag, helmsman, navigator or even a captain and met their fate against the Sea Monkeys.

character.name: Rittonto
character.description: Rittonto is Tonjit`s grandson. He appears only in the anime.

character.name: Umi no Nushi
character.description: The Umi no Nushi is a large Sea King that inhabitants the waters around Long Ring Long Land island.

character.name: Umi Ressha Puffing Tom
character.description: The Puffing Tom is Tom`s only fully functioning Sea Train. Puffing Tom was built during Tom`s original ten year hiatus from government persecution, with significant improvements added over the Rocket Man.

character.name: Yagara Bulls
character.description: Yagara Bulls are horse-like and are the main mode of transportation in Water 7. They are used for carrying light cargo across the water to desired destinations, sightseeing, or simply everyday travel. It costs 2,000 Berry to rent two yagara bulls.

character.name: Rabuka Bulls
character.description: Rabuka Bulls are a larger and seemingly more violent type of yagara bull that has so far only been seen on the island of Water 7.

character.name: Surume
character.description: Surume is a kraken which dwells in the deepest parts of the ocean, and was a subordinate of the New Fishman Pirates, but later became Luffy`s pet. Luffy is the one who gave Surume his name.

character.name: Megalo
character.description: Megalo is a Megalodon shark that lives on Fishman Island. He is the beloved pet of Princess Shirahoshi and former pet of the Neptune Army.

character.name: Ankoro
character.description: Ankoro is a gigantic anglerfish under the command of captain Vander Decken IX, residing in the Underworld of the Sea, 7000 meters underneath the ocean surface. Wadatsumi seems to regard Ankoro as a pet, as apparently Ankoro has needed to be told to "not to eat ships" before.

character.name: Oonyuudou Wadatsumi
character.description: "Oonyuudou" Wadatsumi is a giant tiger blowfish fishman and a member of the Flying Pirates under captain Vander Decken IX.

character.name: Vander Decken IX
character.description: Vander Decken IX is the current captain of the Flying Pirates on their ship, the Flying Dutchman, and the eighth descendent of the Vander Decken of legend. He is a Japanese bullhead shark fishman and a major antagonist during the Fishman Island Arc.

character.name: Flying Kaizoku-dan
character.description: The Furaingu Kaizoku-dan are a pirate crew led by Vander Decken IX, floating over the ocean floor and endangering the citizens of Fishman Island. The crew is possibly named after the flagship used by Vander Deckens for nine generations, the Flying Dutchman. The captains of the Furaingu Kaizoku-dan and the Shin Gyojin Kaizoku-dan Pirates have sworn an alliance with each other.

character.name: Flying Dutchman Gou
character.description: The Flying Dutchman is an old ship from maritime folklore. In the series, the ship and its surrounding legends were revealed to be real.

character.name: Sendai no Saibanchou
character.description: The predecessor judge was the head of the judicial ship that sailed to Water 7.

character.name: Hammond
character.description: Hammond is a member of the New Fishman Pirates. He is a daggertooth pike conger fishman.

character.name: Shin Gyojin Kaizokudan
character.description: The New Fishman Pirates are a group of fishman-based pirates residing in Fishman Island, though they also include several mermen, sea monsters, and enslaved humans. The New Fishman Pirates are currently the most prominent figures in the long history of human/fishmen hate over their hero Fisher Tiger`s death.They carry on the legacy of Arlong, having established their crew based on Arlong`s ideals. Like Arlong, they wish to make fishmen the supreme race and aim to sink the humans into the ocean.

character.name: Hody Jones
character.description: Hody Jones is a great white shark fishman, the captain of the New Fishman Pirates, and a former soldier of the Neptune Army. He is an admirer and strong believer of Arlong`s ideals, and is the primary antagonist of the Fishman Island Arc.

character.name: Dosun
character.description: Dosun is a hammerhead shark fishman and one of the officers of the New Fishman Pirates.

character.name: Zeo
character.description: Zeo is an officer of the New Fishman Pirates. He is a Japanese wobbegong fishman and the self-proclaimed "Noble of the Fishman District".

character.name: Daruma
character.description: Daruma is a cookie-cutter shark fishman and an officer of the New Fishman Pirates.

character.name: Ikaros Much
character.description: Ikaros Much is a giant squid fishman and an officer of the New Fishman Pirates, serving under his captain Hody Jones.

character.name: Hyouzou
character.description: Hyouzou is a poisonous blue-ringed octopus merman. He is a mercenary, currently working as the New Fishman Pirates` assassin, and he is known as the best swordsman on Fishman Island.

character.name: Harisenbon
character.description: Harisenbon is a fishman and a member of the New Fishman Pirates. He is the commander of the Sea Urchin-Armor Spine Squad.

character.name: Gyro
character.description: "Crab-Hand" Gyro is the captain of a pirate crew from South Blue that was on its way to the New World before an unfortunate meeting with the New Fishman Pirates.

character.name: Umi Jishi
character.description: The Sea Lion is a sea monster that lives in the depths of the ocean.

character.name: Umi Guma
character.description: The Sea Bear is a sea creature that lives on the ocean floor.

character.name: Ishilly
character.description: Ishilly is a mermaid that lives on Fishman Island and was first seen in Mermaid Cove.

character.name: Kasagon
character.description: Kasagon is a member of the New Fishman Pirates.

character.name: Anmo Knights
character.description: The Anmo Knights serve as the Royal Guards for the Neptune family on Fishman Island. They wear large striped snail shells as helmets and shoulder pads with their eyes covered by a black mask of some kind. The helmets have a spike sticking out in the front, similar to a that of a unicorn. They carry tridents with them.

character.name: Fukaboshi
character.description: Fukaboshi is a shark merman and the first son of the royal Neptune family on Fishman Island. After he, his father and his brothers are liberated by the Straw Hat Pirates, he allies himself with them against Hody Jones and his crew.

character.name: Ryuuboshi
character.description: Ryuuboshi is an oarfish merman and the second son of the royal Neptune family on Fishman Island.

character.name: Manboshi
character.description: Manboshi is an opah merman and the third son of the royal Neptune family on Fishman Island.

character.name: Shirley
character.description: Madame Shirley is a shortfin mako shark mermaid. She is a fortune teller living on Fishman Island, the proprietor of the Mermaid Cafe, and Arlong`s younger sister. Madame Shirley accurately predicted the dawning of the Great Age of Pirates, as well as the outcome of the Battle of Marineford and Whitebeard`s death.

character.name: Neptune
character.description: King Neptune is a coelacanth merman and the king of the Ryugu Kingdom on Fishman Island. He is the father of Fukaboshi, Ryuboshi, Manboshi, and Shirahoshi, and the husband of the late Queen Otohime.

character.name: Hoe
character.description: Hoe is the pet whale of King Neptune who uses him as a means of transportation. The only word he can say is his own name.

character.name: Octopako
character.description: Octopako is a octopus fishwoman who Hatchan tried to win over during his mini-series Hatchan`s Sea-Floor Stroll. Source: onepiece.wikia.com

character.name: Udaijin
character.description: The Minister of the Right is a seahorse merman in service to King Neptune. While it is not clear exactly what his job entails, he appears to have some administrative and military duties. He also appears to be a guard or commander as he and other guards hurried to the princess when she needed help. His actual name is unknown. Source: onepiece.wikia.com

character.name: Sadaijin
character.description: The Minister of the Left is a catfish merman in service of King Neptune. While it is not clear what his job entails, it appears to involve some sort of administrative and military duties. His actual name is unknown. Source: onepiece.wikia.com

character.name: Shirahoshi
character.description: Princess Shirahoshi, also known as the Mermaid Princess, is a giant smelt-whiting mermaid and the youngest of King Neptune`s children. Source: onepiece.wikia.com

character.name: Den
character.description: Den is Tom`s younger brother. He is a bering wolffish merman. He is also a shipwright and a Sea Forest researcher.

character.name: Papaneel
character.description: Papaneel is a fishman who lived on Fishman Island at the same time as Otohime. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Aladdin
character.description: Aladdin is a goatsbeard brotula merman. He was a Ryugu Kingdom soldier and then a slave before becoming a pirate as the doctor of the Sun Pirates. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Kadar
character.description: Kadar is a Marine rear admiral at the G-2 Marine base from fifteen years ago. His current location and rank position are unknown. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Mjosgard Sei
character.description: Mjosgard Sei is a World Noble who visited Fishman Island eight years before the start of the series. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Seira
character.description: Seira is a bluestriped angelfish mermaid and an employee of the Mermaid Cafe. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Kairen
character.description: Kairen is a righteye flounder mermaid and an employee of the Mermaid Cafe. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Hiramera
character.description: Hiramera is a olive flounder mermaid and an employee of the Mermaid Cafe. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Luca
character.description: Luca is a mermaid living in Mermaid Cove. She is one of the citizens who provided her signature in support of the relocation of Fishman Island`s population. She is an anime-only character. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Togare
character.description: Togare is a fishman that lives in Coral Hill. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Mero
character.description: Mero is a smelt-whiting mermaid and an employee of the Mermaid Cafe. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Take
character.description: Take is a carp fishman and is a member of the Arlong Pirates. He is the commander of parties. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Karuwaza Fuwas
character.description: The Karuwaza Fuwas are a minor pirate group within the Buggy Pirates. Source: One piece Wikia

character.name: Monban
character.description: Monban are the guardians of Kaya`s mansion, recruited by Kuro (disguised as Kurahadol the butler) to keep the entry of the mansion safe. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Kurosai FR-U 4 Gou
character.description: The Kurosai FR-U IV is one of the newest additions to the Thousand Sunny`s Soldier Dock, residing in the previously unoccupied Dock 4. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Brachio Tank V
character.description: The Brachio Tank V is one of the newest additions to the Thousand Sunny`s Soldier Dock, residing in the newly created Dock 5. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Franky Shogun
character.description: Franky Shogun is the newest addition to the Battle Franky line, numbered BF 38. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Nuru
character.description: Nuru was an angler fishman. He was an anime only member of the New Fishman Pirates that fought Zoro at Gyoncorde Plaza. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Daidalos
character.description: Daidalos was a giant squid that was close friends with Ikaros Much. He was first shown when Ikaros was thinking of him. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Fillonce
character.description: Fillonce is a mermaid and an employee at Mermaid Cafe. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Maria Napole
character.description: Maria Napole is a singer and is considered the pride of Fishman Island. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Adele
character.description: Adele is a mermaid and is an employee at Mermaid Cafe. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Sora
character.description: Sora is a mermaid and an employee at Mermaid Cafe. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Lulis
character.description: Lulis is a mermaid and is an employee at Mermaid Cafe. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Pekoms
character.description: Pekoms is a combatant of the Big Mom Pirates. He is partnered with Tamago, and both are responsible for collecting the monthly payment of sweets from Fishman Island in exchange for Big Mom`s protection. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Tamago Danshaku
character.description: Tamago Danshaku is a combatant of the Big Mom Pirates, who originates from the Longleg Tribe. He and his partner Pekoms are responsible for collecting the monthly payment of sweets from Fishman Island in exchange for Big Mom`s protection. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Big Mom Kaizokudan
character.description: The Big Mom Kaizokudan are an infamous pirate crew. The crew`s captain is one of the Yonkou, Charlotte Linlin. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Big Mom
character.description: Big Mom is the captain of the Big Mom Pirates. She was the last Yonkou to be named. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Bobbin
character.description: Bobbin is a member of the Big Mom Pirates. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Bunny Joe
character.description: Bunny Joe is a member of the Revolutionary Army and leader of the group that rescued people of Tequila Wolf from slavery along with Nico Robin. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Bins
character.description: Bins is a member of Neo Marines in the One Piece Film Z. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Ain
character.description: Ain is part of Z`s crew in the One Piece Film Z. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Lily Enstomach
character.description: Lily Enstomach, also known as "Lily the Glutton" is an anime-only giant who appeared during the Z`s Ambition Arc. She is the daughter of Panz Fry. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Shuzo
character.description: Shuzo is a commander of the Neo Marines. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Panz Fry
character.description: Panz Fry is an anime-only giant that appears in the Z`s Ambition Arc. He is Lily Enstomach`s father. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Neo Kaigun
character.description: The Neo Marines are a group led by Z in order to annihilate all pirates and the main antagonist group of One Piece Film Z. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Z
character.description: Z is the leader of the Neo Marines and the main antagonist of the One Piece Film Z. He was once a Marine admiral before his resignation. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Alapacacino
character.description: Alapacacino is Shuzo`s pet alpaca. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Kin`emon
character.description: Kitsune-bi no Kin`emon is a samurai from Wano Country whom the Straw Hat Pirates found in various pieces at Punk Hazard. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Monet
character.description: Monet was a harpy who posed as a scout and assistant for Caesar Clown and his underlings in the research facility on Punk Hazard. She was revealed to be a deep cover agent sent by Donquixote Doflamingo. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Donquixote Kaizokudan
character.description: The Donquixote Pirates, also known as Donquixote Family, is a group led by Donquixote Doflamingo, who goes by the underworld broker alias "Joker". Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Caesar Clown
character.description: Caesar Clown, also referred to as "Master" by his underlings, is a former colleague of Vegapunk and the primary antagonist of the Punk Hazard Arc. Caesar is the leading expert on chemical weapons of mass destruction and is a demented scientist with a bounty of 300,000,000 Berrys on his head. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Bilic
character.description: Bilic is a Marine commodore stationed on Hand Island. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Diego
character.description: Diego is a craftsman of wax modeling on Hand Island and Regis` father. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Regis
character.description: Regis is a Marine on Hand Island. He is Diego`s son. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Sind
character.description: Sind is a boy who was being held captive in the Biscuits Room, on Punk Hazard. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Mocha
character.description: Mocha is a girl who was being held captive on Punk Hazard. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Konbu
character.description: Konbu is a child who lived in Punk Hazard`s Biscuits Room. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Doran
character.description: Doran is a boy who was captured and kept in the Biscuits Room on Punk Hazard. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Chahige
character.description: After his defeat at the hands of Basil Hawkins, he quit being a pirate and resides on Punk Hazard, becoming the boss of the Centaur Patrol Unit which guards part of the island, until his "Master" Caesar Clown betrayed him. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Uzu
character.description: Uzu is a child who was held captive in Punk Hazard`s Biscuits Room. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Biyo
character.description: Biyo is a boy who was held captive on Punk Hazard by Caesar Clown. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Ally
character.description: Ally is a young girl who was being held captive in the Biscuit Room, on Punk Hazard. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Medaka no Ningyo no Itsutsubu
character.description: The Medaka Mermaid Quintuplets are five tiny young mermaids who are friends with Keimi. Their names are Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, and Yonka Two.

character.name: Smoothie
character.description: Tekkin no Smoothie is an ex-prisoner, who is now a centaur henchman for Caesar Clown. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Fen Bock
character.description: Hyoutan Fen Bock is an ex-prisoner. During the Punk Hazard Arc, he worked as a satyr henchman for Caesar Clown. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Smiley
character.description: Smiley, more commonly known as Slime and also as Shinokuni, was a pet of Caesar Clown. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Chappe
character.description: Nawahiki no Chappe is an ex-prisoner, who was a henchman for Caesar Clown. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Yarisugi
character.description: Yarisugi is a Marine Commodore of G-5 Unit 06. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Chessmarimo
character.description: Chessmarimo is a fusion of Chess and Kuromarimo, created by Wapol`s Baku Baku Factory.
